content:
Don't forget to register for the January 13-15 Connectathon -- http://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2021/01/?ref=signature
Early bird registration deadline is December 30, 2020.
@Saul Kravitz Is there a schedule for the upcoming Connectathon? Particularly interested in seeing when the DaVinci tracks are, but not seeing specifics about the schedule on the Confluence page.
Plan-Net and Formulary are part of a 'Patient Access API' track. https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97464494
Thanks. Do you know when Zoom info will be populated? Currently marked as TBD.

Hello,

Is there a possibility to bring a discussion item to the DaVinci PDex track?

I would like to see if the DaVinci group would consider a minor modification.

Data producers can utilize existing identity management solutions (i.e., member portal login) to receive prior authorization information (or other inbound data). This process involves including inbound endpoints within the patient access API that will interface with B2B applications ('Application+user' authorize access for the PUT endpoints).

I would also like to share a diagram that summarizes this concept.

@Mark Scrimshire and gang FYI

image.png

Thanks!

@David Clowers , the conference will be held within the Whova Application, where attendees actually enter each meeting zoom. You can sign up for Whova here: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202101/sign_in/ Confluence will not have the links. Think of it like a virtual conference center/hotel where you access each "room" through the agenda. Let me know any questions,
HIPAA-Member-Facilitated-Transactions.PNG this version is slightly easier to read.
Josh - You are certainly welcome to bring the discussion topic to the PDex Track. Let's coordinate in the morning to see when we can place it on the agenda.

@Mark Scrimshire, thanks! I will keep an eye out for communications and jump on the PDex line in the AM.

The updated diagram I would like to share is included below:

image.png
Have there been any break-out sessions for Provider yet? Have yet to receive any invitations.
